type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.InputDirectory
type.description:
*

Marks a property as specifying an input directory for a task.

* *

This annotation should be attached to the getter method or the field for the property.

* *

This will cause the task to be considered out-of-date when the directory location or contents * have changed. To make the task dependent on the directory location but not the * contents, use an {@link org.gradle.api.tasks.Input} annotation instead.
